package FebWeek1;
import java.util.*;
public class Assignment2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("enter the value in degree Fehrenheit ");
		float fer = sc.nextFloat();
		int temp = 0;
		double cel = (fer - 32)/1.8;
		System.out.println("the value in cecius is "+cel);
		

	}

}
